contexts.context: ...In Hungary live - beside Magyars - several other <mark>tribes</mark>, like Germans, Romanians, Slowakians, Croatians...
...and the Magyars do know that if all those <mark>tribes</mark> get together, Hungary would not be a Magyarianian...
...are not enough. For Albanians (a savage Turkish <mark>tribe</mark> living in Macedonia) the reforms are too much...
